content:
Hello! I've just prepared my first potential PR for mathlib4. Could I please request permission to push a branch to the main repo to run CI? github username @jvlmdr

The PR addresses a todo in Mathlib/Analysis/Distribution/SchwartzSpace.lean (@Moritz Doll) by adding SchwartzMap.iteratedPDeriv_eq_iteratedFDeriv. To do this, I introduced ContinuousMultilinearMap.apply and fderiv_continuousMultilinear_apply_const. I also added iteratedFDeriv_clm_apply_const_apply for completeness.

Diff here: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/compare/9f6d338...jvlmdr:mathlib4:jvlmdr-multilinear

Thanks!
Jack Valmadre has marked this topic as resolved.
